title: Episode 75: Science Proves Subliminal Tapes Work! Well….not really
itunes:title: Episode 75: Science Proves Subliminal Tapes Work! Well….not really
description: Do subliminal messages in self-help tapes really work? There actually is some evidence that people can be influenced by subliminal messages. Can your self-esteem be raised with subliminal tapes? Can subliminal persuasion help you lose weight? Are there subliminal messages in Disney files? Are there subliminal messages in advertising that can make you buy certain products? These questions answered once and for all at The Psych Files podcast.
